mapper.select: select W.WORK_TITLE,W.WORK_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_name, WC.WC_ID, PM.PMEMBER_PROJECT, WC.WC_WORK,WC.WC_GROUP, WC.WC_INDEX, w.WORK_PROGRESS from work W, WORK_MEMBER WM, PROJECT_MEMBER PM, MEMBER M, WORK_CARD WC where W.work_id = WM.WORK_ID and WM.PMEMBER_ID = PM.PMEMBER_ID and PM.PMEMBER_MEMBER = M.MEMBER_MAIL and WC.WC_WORK = W.WORK_ID and W.WORK_PROJECT= #{pmember_project} order by WC.WC_INDEX desc
